text: aur jo kuchh vah log karate hain tumhaara paravaradigaar usase bekhabar nahin aur tumhaara paravaradigaar be paravaah raham vaala hai - agar chaahe to tum sabake sabako (duniya se uda) le lae aur tumhaare baad jisako chaahe tumhaar jaanasheen banae jis tarah aakhir tumhen doosare logon kee aulaad se paida kiya hai
